summary: Provides the core infrastructure for discovering, loading, and managing Metaflow extensions. It implements custom import finders and loaders to support alias‑based imports, lazy loading of extension modules, and utilities for locating extension packages and extracting their metadata.
business_intent: Enable Metaflow to be extensible by allowing third‑party extensions to be automatically discovered and imported with minimal overhead, supporting transparent aliasing and on‑demand loading of extension code.
